text: Kubrick by Kubrick is a 2020 documentary film directed by Gregory Monro about the film director Stanley Kubrick. The film is produced by Martin Laurent, and Jeremy Zelnik under the banners of Arte France, Telemark, and Temps Noir. The film premiered on Arte in France on 12 May 2020. It was scheduled to premiere at the 2020 Tribeca Film Festival, but the festival was canceled due to COVID-19. == Cast == == Reception == , Kubrick by Kubrick holds a 100% approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes, based on five reviews with an average rating of 7 out of 10. Owen Gleiberman writing for Variety said "Everything in a Kubrick movie is delivered to you; every aspect of it is visually, logically, spatially, metaphysically built. Yet in each case what that exquisite structure contains, in its very concreteness, is a mystery. Kubrick controlled every last dimension of his movies. Except what they meant". Sheri Linden of The Hollywood Reporter wrote, "As a look at Kubrick's methods, madness and burning intelligence, Kubrick by Kubrick is fluent and discerning". Eric Kohn of IndieWire said "Kubrick by Kubrick lingers in the restless ingenuity at the heart of the filmmaker's work – a palpable desire to find new storytelling possibilities each time out". == References == == External links == * Category:2020 television films Category:2020 films Category:French television films Category:2020 documentary films Category:French films Category:French documentary films
title: Kubrick by Kubrick
